author: MZ_1
title: Master Chen minifig
review:
It was one of the few Ninjago magazines I missed, so I bought it online.

Packaging / Instructions
As usual, we get a foil bag. It can be closed again and opened for as long as the glue will allow. There are no instructions, but you don't need them.

Minifigures
Master Chen minifig is included in this set. Unfortunately it doesn't have a cloak, but it looks nice nonetheless.

Parts
In addition to the minifigure, the set includes 4 good bricks: 2 snakes, green and red, and two silver claws.

Overall
Great minifigure and parts for a great price. Looks great alone or on the balcony in the set 71735: Tournament of Elements.
